li.label: Police set
li.description: Improve the engine, adding a lightbar and siren box. An average Industrial Era police service vehicle upgrade.

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact..

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact.

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact..

li.label: Wire Window Armour
li.description: Metal frame with strong wire armour to protect the vehicle.

li.label: Plate Window Armour
li.description: Adding metal plates on the armour to protect the vehicle.

li.label: Roof Rack
li.description: Adding roof rack on the vehicle to carry more cargo.

li.label: Cargo Capacity
li.description: Optimize the space in the vehicle to allow for extra storage capacity.

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact.

li.label: Spotlight
li.description: Adding a spotlight on windshield.

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact..

li.label: Spotlight
li.description: Adding a spotlight on windshield.

li.label: Push Bumper
li.description: Adding a push bumper to the front for pursuit stability and impact.

li.label: Spotlight
li.description: Adding a spotlight on windshield.

li.label: Taxi set
li.description: Adding taxi basic set.

li.label: Pintle machine gun
li.description: Attach a heavy machine gun to the top of the turret. Used from the Commander seat.

li.label: Coaxial flamethrower
li.description: Replace the coaxial machine gun with a flamethrower. Used from the Gunner seat. Has a restricted firing angle, so the gunner has to turn the turret before firing.\n\nDoes not take from the vehicle's fuel reserves; it requires a reserve of fuel in the cargo hold to reload.

li.label: Medium machine gun
li.description: Attach a medium machine gun to the bed. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -15kg

li.label: Heavy machine gun
li.description: Attach a heavy machine gun to the truck's bed. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -58kg

li.label: Grenade machine gun
li.description: Attach a grenade machine gun to the bed. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -62kg

li.label: Recoilless launcher
li.description: Attach a recoilless launcher to the bed. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -7kg

li.label: Rocketswarm turret
li.description: Attach a rocketswarm launcher to the bed. Greatly reduces maximum load capacity. Removes Passenger 2 and 3 slots and is controlled by Passenger 1. \n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -50kg

li.label: Improved turret
li.description: Replace the simple remotely-controlled autocannon turret with a modernized ergonomic turret. Comes with an improved fire control system, smoke grenade launchers, a coaxial machine gun and fires higher caliber shells.

commandDescriptions.li: A defensive smokescreen. When activated, it will release a cloud of smoke, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on. Has three charges and will require a chemfuel reload after they are spent. Right click to reload.

li.label: Medium machine gun (Bow)
li.description: Add a medium machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -15kg

li.label: Medium machine gun (Aft)
li.description: Add a medium machine gun to the aft of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 3 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -15kg

li.label: Heavy machine gun (Bow)
li.description: Add a heavy machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -58kg

li.label: Heavy machine gun (Aft)
li.description: Add a heavy machine gun to the aft of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 3 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -58kg

li.label: Grenade machine gun (Bow)
li.description: Add a grenade machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -62kg

li.label: Grenade machine gun (Aft)
li.description: Add a grenade machine gun to the aft of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 3 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -62kg

li.label: Recoilless launcher (Bow)
li.description: Add an anti-tank recoilless launcher to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 2 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -7kg

li.label: Recoilless launcher (Aft)
li.description: Add an anti-tank recoilless launcher to the aft of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 3 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -7kg

li.label: Gun truck conversion
li.description:
Install three machine gun emplacements to the truck's bed. Each gun has a limited angle, but will cover all directions if all are active.

Side MMGs are used from the Passenger 2 and 3 seats, and the rear HMG is used from the Passenger 9 seat.

<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -80kg

li.label: Self-propelled artillery conversion
li.description:
Mount a salvaged flak cannon to the bed, converting the vehicle into a self-propelled artillery piece.

Not capable of indirect fire and is mounted on a slow vehicle, making it suitable for defense instead of assault.

Greatly reduces load capacity and takes up seating space, only leaving space for 3 gunners and the cannon's ammunition.

li.label: Heavy Reinforcement
li.description:
Redesign the armor with uranium, allowing for far greater durability at the cost of fuel efficiency and acceleration.

<color=#bb8f04>Protection:</color> +20% Sharp, +30% Blunt
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel Efficiency:</color> -50

li.label: Larger Pod
li.description: Rebuild the pod structure with plasteel, reducing load to give space for one extra occupant with the same armor and fuel efficiency.

li.label: Flame Launcher
li.description: Replace the mortar with a mechanoid-style flamebolt launcher using salvaged technology. Directly takes fuel from the chemtank when reloading.

li.label: Military Turret
li.description: Replace the mortar with a twin-barreled gun turret for urban deployment.

li.label: Air Compressors
li.description: Redesign the thrusters with upgraded air compressors for higher fuel efficiency at high altitudes. Decreases fuel consumption.\n<color=#bb8f04>Fuel Efficiency:</color> +600

li.label: Larger Pod
li.description: Rebuild the pod structure with plasteel, reducing load to give space for two extra occupants with the same armor and fuel efficiency.

li.label: Heavy Reinforcement
li.description:
Redesign the armor with uranium insets, allowing for far greater durability at the cost of fuel efficiency and acceleration.

<color=#bb8f04>Protection:</color> +20% Sharp, +30% Blunt
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel Efficiency:</color> -100

li.label: Medium machine gun
li.description: Add a medium machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 5 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -15kg

li.label: Heavy machine gun
li.description: Add a heavy machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 5 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -58kg

li.label: Grenade machine gun
li.description: Add a grenade machine gun to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 5 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -62kg

li.label: Recoilless launcher
li.description: Add an anti-tank recoilless launcher to the bow of the vessel. Used from the Passenger 5 seat.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo capacity:</color> -7kg

li.label: Cargo Capacity
li.description: Improve the cargo capacity of the vehicle slightly.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Cargo:</color> +25kg

li.label: Armor
li.description: Reinforce the armor of the vehicle slightly.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Protection:</color> +2% Sharp, +4% Blunt

li.label: Speed
li.description: Improve the engine of the vehicle, allowing it to reach higher maximum speed.

li.label: Acceleration
li.description: Improve shifting capabilities of transmission to increase acceleration speed of the vehicle slightly.

li.label: Fuel Consumption
li.description: Improve the exhaust system of the vehicle, improving fuel efficiency slightly.

li.label: Fuel Capacity
li.description: Increase the size of the chemtank slightly.

li.label: Seating
li.description: Pressurize the cargo hold and add seats to fit 33 people, at the cost of most of the cargo space. Also acts as a temporary shelter, providing comfort for all passenger occupants.

li.label: Tachanka
li.description: Upgrade to Tachanka that was equipped with a heavy machine gun to replace an immovable tripod.

li.label: FireWall
li.description: Upgrade to FireWall that was illegally modified and equipped with a quad mounted anti-aircraft machine gun.

li.label: BatteringRam
li.description: Upgrade to BatteringRam equipped with ancient heavy cannons can collapse a building with just one shot.

li.label: PipeOrgan
li.description: Upgrade to PipeOrgan equipped with IFV machine gun turrets and multi barrel anti tank missile launchers.

li.label: Crusher
li.description: Upgrade to Crusher equipped with a BMP turret and a machine gun.

li.label: Porter
li.description: Upgrade to Porter that replaced the rear seats by cargo box.

li.label: Fellowtown
li.description: Upgrade to Fellowtown that added a dual mounted anti-aircraft gun in the cargo box.

li.label: Katyusha
li.description: Upgrade to Katyusha that added an aviation rocket nest in the cargo box.

li.label: Sturmgeschutz
li.description: Upgrade to Sturmgeschutz that added a BMP turret in the cargo box.

li.label: Vasilek
li.description: Upgrade to Vasilek that added a large caliber mortars in the cargo box.
